resources.string:
Hello! My name is Mirza! 
 I am an Engineer in computer science and information technologies, photographer for past ten years and a gamer since I can remember. My first contact with video games was in 1989, a year when I got Atari. Yup, that was over 30 years ago. Later on, I got my Sega Master System and Super Nintendo, and those games I still play today and I will stream them here. But it was 1997 when I was introduced to PC gaming and addicted ever since. Everyone is welcome here, and do enjoy my streams.

 NOTE:
 As for the chat rules goes, do not insult anyone different than you and we will be ok!
 When I reach Affiliate status, I will begin my MONTHLY GIVEAWAYS . That will include new game in digital copy every month for someone to get for free. All you have to do is follow me, watch my streams, chat with me and help me reach affiliate status.
